## Description {#details}

A variadic template argument.

This node represents an occurrence of J&lt;something&gt;E in some &lt;template-args&gt;. It isn&#39;t itself unexpanded, unless one of its Elements is. The parser inserts a <a href="/docs/api/classes/parameterpack">ParameterPack</a> into the TemplateParams table if the &lt;template-args&gt; this pack belongs to apply to an &lt;encoding&gt;.

Definition at line 1463 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h">ItaniumDemangle.h</a>.
